body:
Sometimes shape inference is not feasible as the output shape depends not only the input shape but also the input value. One example is those SparseNN ops. In this case, we have to do a fake run. 

Another reason is that our shape inference is not very robust. It might fail even it's not the case above.
body_html:
Sometimes shape inference is not feasible as the output shape depends not only the input shape but also the input value. One example is those SparseNN ops. In this case, we have to do a fake run.

Another reason is that our shape inference is not very robust. It might fail even it's not the case above.
body_text:
Sometimes shape inference is not feasible as the output shape depends not only the input shape but also the input value. One example is those SparseNN ops. In this case, we have to do a fake run.
Another reason is that our shape inference is not very robust. It might fail even it's not the case above.
